version_description:
international release
In celebration of the international release
Limited time collection 1000 amethyst

1. Added Spanish language.
2. Cloud data will autosave after Platinum trial.
3. Increase the drop rate of 4 star weapons.
4. Fix UI bugs.

1. Added Spanish language.
2. Cloud data will autosave after Platinum trial.
3. Increase the drop rate of 4 star weapons.
4. Fix UI bugs.
5. Fix IAP bugs.

1. Storyline: Addition of Breaking Dawn - Epilogue.
2. Levels: Addition of Infinite Corridor, Nos' Temple.
3. Shop: Reset of the double amethyst award for first-time purchases.
4. Shop: Addition of Limited Edition Divine Chest.
5. Shop: Removal of Limited Edition Fairy Monarch Chests.
6. New companion cards: God of Magic - Nos, Book Mushroom, Small Bat, Baby Wolf.
7. Aphinor companion card effects adjusted: Bonus to dark attacks (large) REMOVED, Bonus to water attacks (exceptional) ADDED.
8. Domain of Trials: Addition of the Goddess of Eternity - Aphinor and God of Magic - Nos.
9. Marketplace: new items added, "Fire Emperor Nos", "Eternal Aphinor", "Nos Divine Stone", and "Aphinor Divine Stone".
10. Fix font and UI bugs.

1. Storyline: Addition of Breaking Dawn - Epilogue.
2. Levels: Addition of Infinite Corridor, Nos' Temple.
3. Shop: Reset of the double amethyst award for first-time purchases.
4. Shop: Addition of Limited Edition Divine Chest.
5. Shop: Removal of Limited Edition Fairy Monarch Chests.
6. New companion cards: God of Magic - Nos, Book Mushroom, Small Bat, Baby Wolf.
7. Aphinor companion card effects adjusted: Bonus to dark attacks (large) REMOVED, Bonus to water attacks (exceptional) ADDED.
8. Domain of Trials: Addition of the Goddess of Eternity - Aphinor and God of Magic - Nos.
9. Marketplace: new items added, "Fire Emperor Nos", "Eternal Aphinor", "Nos Divine Stone", and "Aphinor Divine Stone".
10. Fix image compression issue

1. Domain of Trials: Addition of divine boss: God of Knowledge - Balder
2. Shop: God of Magic - Nos Divine Chest replaced by God of Knowledge - Balder Divine Chest (Unused chests carry over).
3. Shop: Guaranteed Sophie companion card for every 20th amethyst chest replaced by Rita companion card
4. Fixed vanishing timer bug in Platinum trials
5. Fixed upgrade materials bug for the item Eternal Aphinor
6. Added the items Balder's Immortality and Balder Divine Stone to the marketplace
7. Made icons for divine weapons more recognizable
8. Fixed a bug in "Act 10-3, Night falls", for which the storyline is incorrectly implemented

1.Addition to main story line: Eternal Senia - The Wheel of Fate - Prologue.
2.Level addition: Sanctum Streets, Courtroom.
3.Store: Chest of the Goddess of Justice is now available.
4.Store: Removal of the Chest of the God of Wisdom (Unopened chests will be kept).
5.New companions: Goddess of Justice - Themis, Chicken, Axolotl, Master Knight, Priest
6.New Domain of Trials: Goddess of Justice - Themis
7.New items in the marketplace: Sword of Justice - Themis, Themis' Divine Stone
